profile.title: Profíli ya mosaleli
profile.mustLogin: Esengeli okɔta libándá te: yébisa nkombo mpe monyoko mpo na komona baparamɛtɛ.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Lakisa ya ebandeli elandani na oyo ebongolami
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Lakisa ya ebandeli elongo na bobongoli
profile.disappearingMessages: Sambisa nsango ezanga sima (ezangaka na ntango)
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Sekɔnde kino eboma moko na moko
profile.noPrivateKey: Mokɛyi ya sekele ezali te na appareil oyo mpo na kozwa libándá.
profile.setBackupPassword: Tia mot de passe mpo na kobatela backup na bobateli:
profile.backupDownloaded: Backup ebombami mpe ezuami na bobateli.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Kɔtisa mot de passe ya backup oyo:
profile.importSuccess: Mokɛyi ya sekele emonani na appareil oyo.
profile.importFailed: Kotɛlemisa mokɛyi elongi te (mot de passe ezali mabe to fichier ebebi).
profile.keysRotated: Bapari ya bakɛyi ya sika esalemi mpe cle publique etelemeli.
profile.importKey: Kɔtisa backup ebombami na mot de passe
profile.keyDisclaimer: Mokɛyi na yo ya sekele ebima naino te na appareil oyo. Bimisa kopi ebombami na mot de passe mpo na kozongisa yango na appareil mosusu.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Ozali na Free — salá Sun/Moon na nse. Panzola mpo na kofungola ba thème ebele.
profile.backupTitle: Backup ebombami na mot de passe & Kokanisa na bamasini
profile.backupDesc: Salá backup ebombami na mot de passe ya bakɛyi na yo, mpe zongisa na appareil mosusu mpo na kosinchronisa.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Bulekisa soki application ezali na libándá
profile.notifyOnCopy: Sɛnga sango soki bamosali bakopi nsango na ngai
profile.followHint: Makambo na bango ekomonana na 'Following' soki batieli 'Followers' to 'Public'.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Eloko moko ebungi na etuka oyo.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Benga mpe mitɛksɛ ekɔya ekobenganisama na telefone to email oyo endimisami. Kobimisa ekoki kolakisa numéro ya Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Pona nsango to eteni ya kosolola mpo na kobanda kosolola
chat.emptySubtitle: Tinda nsango mpo na kobanda kosolola.

status.filesNote: Ti na ba-fichier 5. Ekosila na ngonga 24 na ndakisa.

auth.headline: Nsango ya bokengeli, ya mokili mobimba na bobongoli ya mbala moko
auth.description: Kokengela banda na suka, bobongoli na AI, nsango ezangaka, mpe kobenga mongongo/video.

feature.encryption: Kokengela banda na suka (E2E) na libándá
feature.translation: Bobongoli ya lokóta koleka 100 na automatique
feature.privacy: Privacy liboso. Donnée na yo, bokambi na yo.

auth.desktopTip: Na ordinateur? Scaná na telefone mpo na kozwa application.
auth.subhead: Nsango ya sekele, ebombami, mpe ebongolamaka — mbala moko.
auth.tip: Okoki kosalela Chatforia na appareil nyonso — to telemelisa application mpo na mayele koleka.
auth.scanHint: Scaná mpo na kozwa application to kofungola na navigateur.

home.title: Ebandeli
home.subheader: Tinda nsango mpo na kobanda lisolo.

press.title: Press
press.contact: Mpo na mituna ya média, kokoma epai na biso na press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Mpo na mituna ya média, kokoma epai na biso na press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ezali mosakoli ya bokengeli na bobongoli mbala moko mpe E2E, esalemi mpo na kosalisa masolo ya mokili mobimba kozala ya sekele mpe ya pete.
press.assetsText: Logo, bililingi ya écran, mpe bililingi ya produit (ekoyá nokinoki).

careers.title: Misala (Careers)
careers.intro: Tozali ekipi ya moke ezali kotonga mosakoli ya mokili mobimba. Soki olingaka bokengeli, accessibilité, mpe UX ya malamu, tóyoka yo.
careers.openRoles: Génie (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Produit, Lisungi.
careers.apply: Tindá CV/ba-liens na jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Mpo na Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ezali mosakoli ya lokóta ebele, na bokengeli banda na suka, bobongoli mbala moko, mpe kobenga mongongo/video. Mission na biso: kosalisa bato bákangana — na sekele, na kimia, mpe kozanga mabaku ya lokóta.

values.access: Bobongoli ya lokóta koleka 100.
values.control: Nsango ezangaka & bilemboli ya kotángama ezali ya kopona.

about.howDescription: Nsango ebombamaka na appareil na yo liboso esangisama. Bobongoli, backup, mpe kokanisa bamasini basalelami mpo na kokitisa makambo tokoki komona na serveur.

advertise.title: Sala publicité na Chatforia
advertise.description: Kómísa bato basalelaka masakoli na bisika ya kitoko, ya bobateli ya marque. Tozali na ba-bannières na bisika emonanaka, sponsorisation, mpe ba-promo ya ndako. Bakozali Premium bamona ba-ads te.

adsense.withPubId: Sik’oyo tosalelaka Google AdSense. Soki olingi kotia mpo na biso na Google Ads, salelá publisher ID {{pubId}} mpe senga placement esalelamaka na ba-unit na nse. Sponsoring ya mbala na mbala ezali — salá formulaire.
adsense.noPubId: Sik’oyo tosalelaka Google AdSense. Sponsoring ya ngámbo mpe ezali — salá formulaire na nse.

advertise.noPlacements: Ba-placement nanu te. Bakisa yango na ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Masolo mingi na mikolo nyonso mpe kofanda molai na UI ya chat
why.brandSafe: Ba-format ya bobateli marque; fréquence ebatelami
why.deals: Bozangi kotala to programmatique na AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Matondi! Mituna na yo etindi. Tokolanda nokinoki.
form.successToast: Matondi! Tokokutana na yo sima moke.
form.mailtoInfo: Kofungola email na yo mpo na kotinda mituna…
form.messageLabel: Yebisa biso makambo ya campagne na yo

upgrade.title: Panzola
upgrade.subtitle: Pona plan ekoki na yo: longola ba-ads na Plus, to zwa bisaleli nyonso ya makasi na Premium.

features.aiBasic: Eyano ya AI ya motóya moke
Eyano ya AI ya motóya moke

features.ringtones: Ba-soni ya kobenga & mitɔngɔ ya nsango

gettingStarted.title: Kobanda
gettingStarted.subtitle: Oza mopaya na Chatforia? Lisálá oyo ya mbala moke elakisaka makambo ya ntina mpo ozala na mosala na mɛsɛ.

alert.text: Boyebi oyo ekokola tango tokomisaka bisaleli. Soki eloko moko ezali te, yebisa biso na

section1.title: 1) Sala compte na yo
section1.loginText: na compte na yo oyo ezali.

section2.title: 2) Banda kosolola
section2.item1: Sala DM to Groupe mpe tindá nsango ya liboso.
section2.item2: Salelá bobongoli mbala moko mpo na kosolola na lokóta koleka 100.
section2.item3: Kánta nsango ezangaka mpe bilemboli ya kotángama na Profíli → Privacy.

section3.title: 3) Kende liboso
section3.item2Part1: Kangisa bamasini mosusu mpe tia backup ebombami na

account.q: Ndenge nini nakoki kokela to kozongisa compte na ngai?
account.a: Zwá application to salelá web, tina “Kela compte”, ndimisá email/telefone. Mpo na kozongisa, salelá “Obosani mot de passe”.

privacy.q: Nsango ezali bokengeli banda na suka?
privacy.a: Ɛɛ. Nsango mpe bitɛlɛfɔ ebombamaka banda na suka. Yo mpe moto ozali kosolola na ye nde bokoki kotánga yango.

translate.q: Ndenge nini bobongoli mbala moko esalaka?
translate.a: Sambisa “Bobongoli automatique” na Baparamɛtɛ → Emonaneli & Lokóta. Tokobongola na appareil soki ekoki; soki te, na ba-API ya bokengeli na ba-donnée mike.

contact.a: Koma epai na biso na support@chatforia.com. Yakatia bililingi mpe version ya application na yo.

contact.title: Benga Biso
contact.successMsg: Matondi — ekipi na biso ekoyanola na email.
contact.errorSend: Etindami te. Tango mosusu kotindela support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Politíki oyo elakisi ndenge Chatforia (“biso”) ezwaka, esalelaka, mpe ebatelaka makambo tango osalelaka ba-app na biso. Tosalaka Chatforia mpo tókitisa makambo tokoki komona.

infoWeCollect.title: Makambo tozwaka
infoWeCollect.account: Makambo ya compte (ndakisa, email/telefone) mpo na kokela mpe kobatela compte.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Makambo ebombami (nsango/bitɛlɛfɔ) ebombamaka banda na suka; tozali kotánga yango te.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Makambo ya libunga/usage lokola ba-rapor ya crash, lolenge ya appareil, to analyse ya mike mpo na kobongisa.

howWeUse.title: Ndenge tosalisaka makambo
howWeUse.provide: Kopesa mpe kobatela service (auth, kozanga spam/abus).

sharing.title: Kopesa na basusu
sharing.body: Totɛkaka makambo ya moto te. Tokoki kopesa makambo moke na ba-partenaire ya misala (ndakisa, push, analyse) na boyokani makasi.

rights.title: Makoki na yo
rights.body: Kolanda etuka na yo (GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), okoki kosɛnga kotála, kobongisa, kolongola, to koboya misala mosusu. Kontaktɛ: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Babombeli & Securité
retention.body: Tobombaka kaka oyo esengeli mpo na kosala service mpe tosalaka securité ya manaka. E2E ekoki te kobukama na biso.

children.title: Bana
children.body: Chatforia esalemeli bana ya nse ya mbula 13 te (to ndenge mibeko na yo elobi).

changes.title: Mekolo ya sika
changes.body: Tokotia mise à jour awa mpe tokobongola mokolo ya “Emekoli ya suka”.

intro.body: Soki osaleli Chatforia, ondimi mibeko oyo. Soki olingi te, salelá te service.

accounts.title: Ba-compte
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Pesá makambo ya solo mpe batela ba-code na sekele.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Ozali na mokumba ya makambo nyonso esalemaka na compte na yo.

acceptableUse.title: Bosaleli malamu
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Te na biloko ya mabe, ya kobebisa, to ya liboma; te na spam to abus ya automatique.

yourContent.title: Makambo na yo
yourContent.body: Okobaki makoki na makambo na yo. Opeși biso makoki esengeli mpo na kosala service (ndakisa, kokatisa, kobomba, bobongoli).

disclaimer.title: Lobeli & mokumba
disclaimer.body: Service epesamaka “ndenge ezalaka”. Na ndenge ya mibeko, Chatforia akomemama te mpo na mabe ya sukali to ya koleka.

changes.title: Mekolo ya sika
changes.body: Tokoki kobongola mibeko; kosalela oyo ekolanda emekoli elingi koloba boyokani.

doNotSell.title: Tɛká te to kabola te Makambo na ngai
doNotSell.body: Chatforia etɛkaka te makambo ya moto. Bato ya California bakoki kaka kotinda bosɛngi kolanda CPRA na bouton awa.

cookies.title: Paramɛtɛ ya Cookies
cookies.body: Chatforia asalelaka cookies mike (session, securité). Toasalelaka te cookies ya ba-ads ya bato ya misato. Kamba cookies na paramɛtɛ ya navigateur na yo.
